nodes.text: Quilka-leaf was a substance that was sold on the planet Akiva. Several months after the Battle of Endor, the New Republic pilot Norra Wexley was worried that her son Temmin Wexley would hit a quilka-leaf vendor or other innocent bystander if he piloted a speeder bike down CBD avenue in the city of Myrra on Akiva. Temmin, who was being pursued by Imperial stormtroopers, chose not to fly through the avenue, instead losing the troops on the city's rooftops.
Quilka-leaf was first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
